but again this is your preference for placement eyes put your safety eyes in now row 13-15 single_crochet 30 30 stitches row 16 *decrease in next single_crochet single_crochet 4* repeat around 25 stitches row 17 working in the back loops of row 16 complete - *decrease single_crochet 3* repeat around 20 stitches feet join the feet to the body i place mine in line with the outer edge of the beak you can either knot each leg to the inside individually or just tie the two strands together they will slide with this method but it is easy to adjust i like to pull one or two chain through to the back as well it makes it easier to twist the legs later so that they sit the right way stuff start stuffing and shaping the body the stuffing should be solid in the head and upper belly but light stuffing at the bottom this will help the bird sit flat row 18 *decrease in next single_crochet single_crochet 2* repeat around 15 stitches row 19 *decrease in next single_crochet single_crochet 1* repeat around 10 stitches bind bind off and leave a large tail using your needle thread around the outside of the remaining 10 stitches and pull closed tie off and thread the tail back up through the
